name: America Feng
text: It was very good! There was good customer service and the food was made fresh and the prices were good. Would definitely visit again.

name: Martha Miranda
text: We ordered a pizza last night and the driver did not even say thank you for 8 dollars tip. Pizza crust was sweet, not enough sauce and dry veggies. Worst pizza I have ever had in my life!

name: Karl Haubenstein
text: Somebody told me this place was still there so I had to check on line to see if it was true. I haven't been there in 30 years and I used to be the opening morning manager and cook way back in 1990 and we made good food way back then too lol

name: Anita Jack
text: Good service and nice people.  Pizza was good.  Would go there again.  Great for family.

name: Ryan Smith
text: I almost fell like I've stepped back in time. This pizza Hut has a salad bar üò≤üòÅ only thing missing is the arcade games.

name: Tracey E
text: I've had a few issues with app and the timing, but the people who work here are so personable that I dont mind!

name: Soni Cido & Bubblegum Grace
text: I love it here! Clean and quick, food is always fresh. Great location and easy to find. Only complaint is the women's bathroom needs a little TLC that's easily fixable.

name: Ashley Luna
text: Fast service and great pizza BUT the garlic stuffed knots are grosss!! I ordered them twice and both times they tasted like a chemical

name: Shirley Fitzpatrick
text: We visit this Pizza Hut usually once a week for their lunch buffet. Must say this last visit was one of the best they have offered. They had hand-tossed meat lovers, as well as, all pepperoni. A lot of times they have the thin crust which ‚Ä¶More

name: Becky Zazueta
text: Was part of Management in the early 2000s. Was the best back then and still is!

name: R Ramz
text: Waitress was pleasant and efficient. Very nice young lady. Pizza hut has my favorite Italian dressing and thin and crispy pizza.

name: T. Atanosian
text: Our first time here; we had a great meal! We had their special, 2 medium pizzas with 2 toppings 5.99 each. The garlic butter crust is really good. The manager, Todd, was very nice, and very helpful. We will definitely be going back.

name: Alfonso Stanley
text: Order came out in a timely manner, as for the pizza it self, not so well. You can tell the dough was old because the pizza came out flat. But that distinctive taste was there!

name: RC DM
text: Great place but sad it closed

name: Christopher Roop
text: Go for the buffet. You won't be disappointed.

name: Johnny Walker
text: Nice place my grandsons and I love Pizza hut pizza ü§ó

name: Linda N
text: I was helping set up a birthday party for one of my friends and I thought there was no better food for the occasion than pizza. Everyone seemed to enjoy the pizza, including myself. It was hot and the pepperoni on the pizza was especially flavorful.

name: Thomas Verrett
text: Had the lunch buffet.   Great mix of thin/crispy and thick/deep-dish pizzas.  Our waiter,  Andre, was super attentive and the pizzas were all delicious!!!!

name: Anthony Audelo
text: 2 stars instead of 1 for the cleanliness and staff, this is mostly a rating on Pizza Hut's food quality. athe most boring and tasteless pizza and their red sauce is sweet which in my opinion should never be a thing.

name: Niomi Galindo
text: Very surprised at first. My ticket order was placed at 8:20pm. The pizza arrived at my house at 8:45pm. Super fast, but too fast. The dough was raw and the pizza was folded in half when I opened the box. I had to place it in the oven for a good 10 minutes. I also ordered wings which were pretty good.

name: Robert C.
text: Pizza was substandard, and looked pre-cooked from hours ago when we got home just a block away. and the to-go salad was very sparse. Plus, the crust tasted that they added sugar. Not good at all. We ended up throwing half of it away. Also, ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Madsen
text: Used to do the buffet but it's not available these days. Boo.

name: Joan Porter
text: Excellent service and pizzas made just as we irdered.

name: D.K. Van Slyke
text: This is the place for salad and a slice of pizza on the side.  Prices are good.  Clean and good service.  Also located in great area with parking and wheelchair accessible.

name: Claudia Colantonio
text: Good pizza and service.

name: Rene Valenzuela
text: Best customer service hands down

name: Jeff McCracken
text: Pizza hut buffet. Love it! Andre is the best server.

name: Mike Irwin
text: Seriously!? I picked up an order of wings and if I wanted a complimentary dressing I had to ask for it on the phone!!?? I asked for dressing when I picked up and they wanted to charge me? Not for any extra but for just one. Who sales wings with no dressing? Lost a customer today.

name: Lily Grove
text: So delicious! Great pizza, courteous employees, fast service, reasonably priced. I called Pizza Hut, located at 10605 N Oracle Road in Oro Valley, to order a pizza to be delivered to our home. The man who took my order was courteous, ‚Ä¶More

name: L Shepard
text: I have just recently started coming here and so far I am incredibly impressed with this location. Not only is the food made very well, and exactly the way I order it , but the staff here are probably some of the friendliest employees I've ‚Ä¶More

name: kearstin joan
text: delivery driver has almost hit the front of my car when i pulled out of Starbucks. other than the dangerous driver, the pizza is good.

name: Ryan Morley
text: Ordered a supreme pizza and a cheese with olives and mushrooms. We received a cheese pizza instead of the supreme and was still charged 28 dollars. When I tried to call them I was not able to reach anyone. It just kept keeping me on hold. We have ordered here many times and tonight we were very disappointed.

name: Omni Pool Builders and Design - Omni Pools
text: Great service!  Was kinda slow when we we got there but all of the staff was friendly and very professional.

name: Krista Grossmann
text: The man working when I came in, I believe his name is Chuck, he is the most pleasant man I've ever come across. Great job!

name: Patt Intarakamhang
text: This Pizza Hut has beer. I don't know if all of them do though. It was a good Pizza Hut though. Ordered three pizzas and they came out fast and accurate.

name: Erica Connell
text: Terrible pizza. The dough wasn't cooked, the toppings slid off the slices. We didn't eat it, it was the new Ultimate Cheesy pizza.

name: Aubree Rebenar
text: Extremely friendly and attentive staff.  We had the buffet and everyone enjoyed it.

name: Alex Liebeskind
text: Friendly staff and delicious pizza.

name: Mindy Gonzales
text: Very greasy pizza, not the best service. Will stick to delivery from pizza hut,always good when delivered.

name: Sammysmile
text: Poor quality, these guys are like robots at a factory making your food. For example when I tried their Stuffed Garlic Knots for the first and last time, at $6.51 an order. The first one was just solid bread without the cheese in it, the ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Ibrahim
text: They forgot half my order and didn‚Äôt tell me until asked, made me wait an extra 20 minutes without any issue.

name: Dave P
text: Oro Valley location is always a great experience.  Staff is friendly and the patio is a nice place to eat a pizza with kids.

name: Malisa Ruiz
text: I come here almost every week with my mom and kids we love it pizzas so yum and the service is üëç

name: Ryan VanDero
text: Actually went to Wing Street to get things for pizza night. We order a bunch of wings and spend a lot of cash, but always have a happy family.

name: Kilyndra Taylor
text: Clean and very friendly staff. I came here to redeem my pizza hut rewards.

name: Donald Struber
text: Always excellent food. The manager (Charles) is very pleasant and attentive.

name: Chef Bekah
text: We ordered 2 pizzas online around 7pm to be ready at 9. When we arrived, we tell the clerk that we placed an order online. He says "Stephan?". We say "yes". He stammered for a moment then says he had no knowledge of the order until 2 ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Shuffelbottom
text: Awesome! Great Employees... especially Andre. He always greets everyone with his wonderful smile!  :)

name: Jordan Stapley
text: Staff are always super nice and great pizza

name: Harold Vaubel
text: Although the pizza was good and the server was very curteous and helpful, the restroom was not very clean and there was NO soap.

name: Mathias Munoz
text: It was so good

name: Sharon Fry

name: Desiree Sanchez
